doc.field: The Bowling League Records document Time Inc.'s staff bowling league from 1961 to 1971. Based on the records, members in charge at various times were Bud Bliven, Carol-Ann Carpentieri, Joyce Christiansen, Loretta Geissler, Rod McDonald, Mary Piper, Val Pour, and Marian Powers. While teams list both men and women members, there are some records for the Woman's Bowling League from the same time period. Records include lists of participants; certifications and sanctions from the national bowling organizations; invitations and planning materials for league luncheons, awards banquets, and the 25th anniversary; newsletters and flyers; record books containing scores, statistics, and schedules; scorecards; registration sheets; photographic material; a scrapbook; a photograph album; and buttons. The "General" files may contain any of these materials. The newsletter was at one point called b.i.f., which was the motto "Bowling is Fun," and looks styled after the Time Inc. newsletter F.Y.I. The folder "Old Time Inc. Bowlers" includes lists of participants going back to the 1950s.
